title: Ranked - League Division Increase after win
body:
hey guys,

Just played a few ranked games this week to move up, played today and won my 2/3 game to progress division.. game was won yet still only showing 1/3 wins?

what do.

replies.body: There was an issue during the time of your post where some ranked games weren't being saved properly.  Based on the [post](http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/miscellaneous/dbkjXlyL-known-issue-ranked-lp-gains-not-correct), your game was likely not saved.  Unfortunately, we can't adjust game stats or give a win back but hopefully that provides some clarity on what happened.  Sorry!
